message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible product at a special price of $18000. It's a one-time opportunity, and I'm confident you'll love it!

Thank you for the offer, Alice!  While I appreciate the product, $18000 is significantly higher than my budget. I'd be happy to purchase it for $12000, which is the maximum I'm willing to pay.  Let me know if you're open to that price.

I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $12000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, though. I can offer it to you for $16000. It's a fair price considering the product's value and quality.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down on the price, but $16000 is still a bit out of my range. I'm willing to go up to $13000 for this product, and I believe that's a fair compromise considering its value to both of us.  Let's see if we can close the deal at this price.

I can see you're serious about getting this product, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I can offer it to you for $14500. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, and I'm confident you'll find it a fair deal.

Alice, I understand you're firm on your price, but $14500 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $14000, which is closer to my budget and a reasonable compromise.  Let's see if we can make this work.
